findings.title: PUBLIC visibility of mint and burn functions
findings.description: The mint and burn functions have PUBLIC visibility which may not be intended, potentially leading to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Absence of Error messages in Require Statements
findings.description: The _burnFrom has a require statement in the QuiDax.sol contract that does not include an error message.

findings.title: Redundant Initialization of State Variable
findings.description: The State Variable _paused is being initialized to FALSE in the constructor. However, boolean state variables are FALSE by default and do not require explicit initialization to false.

findings.title: Comparison to boolean Constant
findings.description: Boolean constants can directly be used in conditional statements or require statements.

findings.title: External Visibility should be preferred
findings.description: Those functions that are never called throughout the contract should be marked as external visibility instead of public visibility.
